title: 150A Insulated Bus Bar
blurb: This quality bus bar features a raised insulating base that isolates the bus bar from earthed or other live chassis. It features 2 x 5mm bolted terminals for connecting main power feeds, and 10 screw terminals for connecting lower current feeds of up to 10A each. Total current capacity is 150A, and is suitable for 12-32V wiring. 2 countersunk screw holes for 5mm metric fasteners.
